name: Design Deliverables
description:
A set of A3 templates for presenting design deliverables. It includes 14 diffrent layouts. Use them for portfolios, deliverables, presentations, documentation.

Included are:

- 14 x templates (columns, grids, images)
- Customisable colour theme and typography
- Device frames for screenshots and mockups
- Artboard footer for metadata
- Data tables (Now supports auto layout)

To create your own tables:

1. Add the table from the asset panel
2. Detatch the instance of the table and the rows inside it
4. Select the last cell in each column
5. Duplicate by pressing CTRL/CMD + D for the number of columns you want.
6. Resize the columns to the size you want
7. Duplicate the number of rows you want

Any issues or feedback please feel free to contact me.
